price: (41) And whether [or not] We take you away [in death], indeed, We will take retribution upon them.
arabic: فَإِمَّا نَذۡهَبَنَّ بِكَ فَإِنَّا مِنۡهُم مُّنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-immā nadhhabanna bika fa-innā min'hum muntaqimūna
